content: I have installed the service successfully, and I can create new dataverse and upload the datasets successfully from http://dataverse.domain:8080, but where can I see the public data page I have uploaded?

Hi all, I uploaded the dataset, and then save the dataset, but it stuck, and the page became gray, see blow:
image.png
I have tried many times, and it failed again and again. Anybody has ideas?

Hi all, I uploaded the dataset, and then save the dataset, but it stuck, and the page became gray, see blow:
image.png
I have tried many times, and it failed again and again. Anybody has ideas?

I have installed the service successfully, and I can create new dataverse and upload the datasets successfully fromÂ http://dataverse.domain:8080, but where can I see the public data page I have uploaded?

@Shan Zeng hi, congrats on installing Dataverse.

To see the pages publicly you must publish the root collection (dataverse) and the dataset. Have you done that already?
